package.name: TYPO3Flow
package.description: This package contains a selection of sniffs which implements the Coding Guidelines for TYPO3Flow. Additionally you must install the pear.typo3.org/TYPO3SniffPool package.
package.notes: - #41255: [FEATURE] Add composer support - #42019: [TASK] Replace "TYPO3.Files.OneClassPerFile" with "Generic.Files.OneClassPerFile" - #42020: [TASK] Replace "TYPO3.Files.OneInterfacePerFile" with "Generic.Files.OneInterfacePerFile" - #42022: [TASK] Replace "TYPO3.PHP.ClosingPHPTag" with "Generic.PHP.ClosingPHPTag" - #42023: [TASK] Replace "TYPO3.PHP.CharacterBeforePHPOpeningTag" with "Generic.PHP.CharacterBeforePHPOpeningTag" - #42024: [TASK] Rename "FLOW3" Standard to "TYPO3Flow" - #42311: [FEATURE] Activate "Generic.Files.ByteOrderMark"-Sniff in TYPO3CMS / TYPO3Flow ruleset - #42312: [TASK] Deactivate and remove "TYPO3.Files.EncodingUtf8"-Sniff in both standards - #42975: [TASK] Create PHP_CodeSniffer custom installer for Composer - #42976: [TASK] Split repositories and move to github

release.notes: - #41255: [FEATURE] Add composer support - #42019: [TASK] Replace "TYPO3.Files.OneClassPerFile" with "Generic.Files.OneClassPerFile" - #42020: [TASK] Replace "TYPO3.Files.OneInterfacePerFile" with "Generic.Files.OneInterfacePerFile" - #42022: [TASK] Replace "TYPO3.PHP.ClosingPHPTag" with "Generic.PHP.ClosingPHPTag" - #42023: [TASK] Replace "TYPO3.PHP.CharacterBeforePHPOpeningTag" with "Generic.PHP.CharacterBeforePHPOpeningTag" - #42024: [TASK] Rename "FLOW3" Standard to "TYPO3Flow" - #42311: [FEATURE] Activate "Generic.Files.ByteOrderMark"-Sniff in TYPO3CMS / TYPO3Flow ruleset - #42312: [TASK] Deactivate and remove "TYPO3.Files.EncodingUtf8"-Sniff in both standards - #42975: [TASK] Create PHP_CodeSniffer custom installer for Composer - #42976: [TASK] Split repositories and move to github
- #41260: [BUGFIX] Standards was installed in wrong dir
